snippet: An American charged for his work with United States-backed nonprofit groups refused an offer to leave the country, instead appearing Thursday in an Egyptian criminal court.
abstract: Robert Becker, an American charged in Egypt for his work with United States-backed nonprofit groups, appears in an Egyptian criminal court; Becker chose to stay to stand trial even after his federally financed employer, the National Democratic Institute, posted bail.
lead_paragraph: An American charged for his work with United States-backed nonprofit groups refused an offer to leave the country, instead appearing Thursday in an Egyptian criminal court.

headline.seo: American in Egypt, Robert Becker, Appears in Court
headline.main: An American Who Stayed Appears in Court in Egypt
headline.print_headline: An American Who Stayed Appears in Court in Egypt
